remarks: Lemma for proving ~ sbcom2 .  It is the same as ~ sbcom2 but with additional distinct variable constraints on ` x ` and ` y ` , and on ` w ` and ` z ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Feb-2018.)
statement:
sbcom2v $p |- ( [ w / z ] [ y / x ] ph <-> [ y / x ] [ w / z ] ph ) $.
$d w x z $.
$d x y z $.
